testsuite.name: 用户管理系统测试用例

testcase.name: loginTrue

failure.message:
### Error querying database. Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
Last packet sent to the server was 1 ms ago. ### The error may exist in mapper/SQLMapper.xml ### The error may involve com.tester.model.loginCase ### The error occurred while executing a query ### Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
Last packet sent to the server was 1 ms ago.
